attributes.action: Implement a proper and just Police Complaints procedure in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have formal complaints outstanding against officers of Lothian and Borders police which go back over 25 years.

I have experienced an outright refusal by the force to do anything about it, so I have posted some of the complaints 

here :-

[url]http://www.eggyrunny.co.uk/scotlandsdiscrace.html[/url]

The unwillingness of the force to properly investigate any complaints is clearly undemocratic, and it will be argued that there is no public accountability, therefore we - the public - should not have to pay for corrupt and dishonest policing.

I feel marginalised and oppressed, I resent being told by another police officer that "If I dont like it LEAVE!!"

Fascist Scum!

Mark Turner.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
